text: Metropolitan Batangas or shortly known as Metro Batangas it is one metropolitan area in Mega Manila adjacent outside of Metro Manila it is located in the province of Batangas in the South Luzon, The metro is a proposal metro in the Calabarzon, aside Urban Laguna. ==Municipalities== There are 1 city and 3 municipalities comprise the metro, the Batangas City and the towns of Bauan, Mabini and Tingloy island. ==References== Batangas Category:Batangas
title: Metro Batangas
